verbs.description: atlanta braves [V: eliminated] [ARG2: from playoffs] [ARGM-TMP: after gut - wrenching home loss to dodgers] [ARGM-TMP: when monday began] atlanta fans were riding high from the afterglow of sunday victory at suntrust park and dreaming of a game 5 in los angeles national league division series dodgers nl los angeles dodgers lucas duda braves manny machado atlanta braves national league david freese yasiel puig los angeles acuna suntrust park atlanta mike foltynewicz
